abstract: Google and several brands are testing a smartphone application that sends users to an ad Web site after photographing an ad or label.
snippet: Google and several brands are testing a smartphone application that sends users to an ad Web site after photographing an ad or label.
lead_paragraph: A year ago, Google introduced a smartphone application that lets users take photos of objects and get search results in return. On Tuesday, the company will take that capability into the world of marketing with an experiment allowing five national brands to use the application in their promotional materials.

headline.main: Google Search That Leads to Brand Marketing
headline.print_headline: A Google Search That Leads to Brand Marketing

abstract: The company released a paper contending that countries that limit users’ access to information beyond borders are violating World Trade Organization commitments.
snippet: The company released a paper contending that countries that limit users’ access to information beyond borders are violating World Trade Organization commitments.
lead_paragraph: With China evidently in its sights, Google has released a policy paper contending that countries that limit Internet users’ access to information providers outside their borders violate their World Trade Organization commitments.

headline.main: Google Sees Rules Violations in Limits on Internet Access
headline.print_headline:
Google Sees Rules Violations
In Limits on Internet Access

byline.original: By Keith Bradsher and Claire Cain Miller
